title: Kona Grill has multiple locations across the United States
statement: Kona Grill operates locations in multiple states including Georgia, Idaho, Indiana, Ohio, Texas, Colorado, Minnesota, Arizona, Alabama, Missouri, Nevada, Illinois, Florida, Michigan, and New Jersey.
